containers.name: EPSPowerState
containers.description: Current power state of the spacecraft

items.name: batteryCurrent
items.description: Current flowing into/out of battery (positive = charging)

items.name: timestamp
items.description: Timestamp of the power state measurement

containers.name: EPSSolarArrayState
containers.description: Current state of all solar arrays

items.name: solarArrayVoltages
items.description: Voltage readings from each solar array

items.name: solarArrayCurrents
items.description: Current readings from each solar array

items.name: solarArrayTemperatures
items.description: Temperature readings from each solar array

items.name: sunPresent
items.description: Flag indicating if the sun is currently visible

items.name: totalSolarPower
items.description: Total power currently generated by all solar arrays

items.name: timestamp
items.description: Timestamp of the solar array state measurement

items.name: channelStates
items.description: On/off state of each power channel

items.name: channelCurrents
items.description: Current draw of each power channel

items.name: channelOvercurrentFaults
items.description: Overcurrent fault flags for each channel

items.name: totalSystemPower
items.description: Total power consumed by all channels

items.name: timestamp
items.description: Timestamp of the power channel state measurement
